channel.title: Sam Randels Portfolio
channel.description: Sam Randels is a full stack developer working to build the modern web.

item.title: Springly
item.description: Job searching isn't easy, but it doesn't have to be quite so hard. Springly is a tool designed to assist job-seekers in organizing their job search.
item.dc:creator: Sam Randels

item.title: Portfolio Website
item.description: Most developers have a portfolio page, and most of them look exactly the same.
item.dc:creator: Sam Randels

item.title: ShopDesk
item.description: ShopDesk is a modern e-commerce platform designed for small business from the ground up.
item.dc:creator: Sam Randels

item.title: CommuteBuddy
item.description: Commuting costs more than we realize. CommuteBuddy provides an elegant way to tackle the tough decisions commuters face and save money in the process.
item.dc:creator: Sam Randels

item.title: Personal Wedding Site
item.description: I designed and built a wedding information site for my upcoming wedding.
item.dc:creator: Sam Randels
